name: Back to The Cabin
description:
Plot: The game has the player trying to help a very old friend grieve and come to terms with the loss of her parents, it will focus on the relationship between the two characters and  will be exploring different ways of loving one another. There are many adventures in store for you with plenty of surprises and a few secrets...

The version on this page is the most recent PUBLIC release of the game, check out The Patreon Page for the LATEST version available.
